techmeme.title: Apple settles with the EU over Apple Pay and avoids the threat of fines by agreeing to open NFC access on iOS to third-party wallets for free for a decade (Samuel Stolton/Bloomberg)
Helsing, which offers AI tools for defense, raised €450M led by General Catalyst, a source says at a €4.95B valuation, taking its total funding to €769M (Mark Bergen/Bloomberg)
Tencent-backed Shift Up closed up ~18% after raising $320M in its Seoul IPO, the largest South Korean IPO by a gaming company since Krafton raised $3.8B in 2021 (Bloomberg)
A profile of Priscila Barbosa, who defrauded Uber and other apps by building a $10K per month business renting fake accounts to undocumented workers in the US (Lauren Smiley/Wired)
How the SCOTUS NetChoice ruling on social media platforms' First Amendment rights could affect a host of tech legislation, including kids' online safety laws (Lauren Feiner/The Verge)
